russ.name: Russ 'Riv' Mercer
russ.bio: Once the public face of the Saitama launch. Vanished after suspicious transfers. Some say he was a scapegoat; others say he ran with the money.
notes: Loved the spotlight; rare photos show him with a golden watch.
Rumors: he had backchannels with exchange insiders.

kabal.name: The Kabal
kabal.bio: A small network of wealthy community members and anonymous devs who coordinated the pump-and-dump; used fake accounts and insiders to launder funds.
notes: Members embedded themselves in community moderation.
They posted 'proof of rug' while pulling liquidity.

lessons.title: Lessons for Newcomers
body: Don't trust promises of guaranteed moonshots.
Verify devs independently; look for multi-sig and audits.
Use small test amounts and learn about wallets and transactions.
